title: Remote Privacy Hardening & Digital Safety Support
headline: Protect your digital life no matter where you are.
description: Remote privacy help for individuals and small teams. Lock down your devices, apps, and online activity with expert guidance. Encrypted tools, secure settings, and no guesswork.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Most apps and devices collect personal data by default, even when you turn off basic sharing settings.
Your IP address, browser fingerprint, and system metadata can be used to track you across sites, even without cookies.
Popular apps marketed as private often connect to third-party servers unless properly configured or replaced.

sections.heading: What We Cover
items: Configure hardened, privacy-respecting browsers with vetted extensions
Set up encrypted email and messaging platforms that avoid metadata leakage
Apply DNS filtering to block trackers, ad networks, and malicious infrastructure
Choose and configure VPNs, proxies, or anonymization tools based on your needs
Lock down mobile and desktop systems by disabling telemetry, tracking, and unnecessary services

sections.heading: How It Works
paragraph: This service is available only to local customers with an active remote support plan.
Once your plan is active, you can schedule a secure remote session and we'll review your current setup together.
We apply hardened privacy settings using trusted tools and clear explanations every step of the way.
You stay in full control, with no guesswork, no jargon, and no unnecessary software.
